job description:
JOB TYPE: Long-Term Contract

LOCATION: Dearborn, MI

JOB SUMMARY FOR Data Scientist:

Operations Research and Analytics. This is an opportunity to apply the latest tools and methods in Optimization and Data Science to a variety of mobility opportunities. Recent projects in this group have led to the development of applications in the areas of transportation, city solutions, and connected vehicles.

RESPONSIBILITIES FOR Data Scientist:

Perform analytics and optimization work as a member of the Operations Research team in Smart Mobility Analytics.
Develop optimization models to support Smart Mobility.
Knowledge in vehicle routing and logistics problems is a bonus.

JOB EXPERIENCE FOR Data Scientist:

1+ of years of experience in developing prototype software applications using Java, Scala, C/C++, Python, R, or similar languages and frameworks

BENEFITS FOR Data Scientist:

Medical, Dental, Vacation, Holiday tailored to meet your needs. 401K/Match, $15,000 Life Insurance, Award-Winning Employee Care Program. Established and highly regarded reputation with Green Card and H1 processing.
